summary: Provides an implementation of the QDrift algorithm, which approximates Hamiltonian time evolution by randomly sampling Hamiltonian terms according to their weights and constructing a stochastic Trotter decomposition as a quantum circuit.
business_intent: Facilitates efficient quantum simulation of physical systems by reducing circuit depth and gate count, helping developers of quantum algorithms and applications in chemistry, materials science, and physics to simulate dynamics more resourceâ€‘efficiently on quantum hardware.
